name: Underworld Incorporated
description:
[I'm aware of at least 2 bugs at the moment that a hotfix should be done for them today apologies]

Can you help Remy, our dashing hero, overcome his struggles in his daring race against THE Demon Lord to the top of Hell's corporate ladder?

First-ever Game Jam, I did not have a lot of fo time to work on it, even though it's not great, I know it can only get better, gotta start somewhere c: 

Despite the rough nature, I hope you enjoy the game, and I would be grateful if you could offer any feedback in the comments, thank you :D

Credits: 

Music: 

  • Chaise De l'Obscurité by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com/ 
  • Glass Shatter 2 by Qubodup https://freesound.org/s/219845/ 
  • SergeQuadrado Classical Piano Loop - https://freesound.org/s/468546/ 

Models:

  • 3December -Fantasy Ghost by warbossdil https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/3december-fantasy-ghost-4262dcac54af4ee884739d13... No changes were made to the model itself, only what was done within blueprinting (adding sound effects when it dies, bopping up and down, being killed by a glass jar.)
  •  Mixamo was used for the character models 
  •  infinity blade pack from the unreal store for the weapons.
  • Low Poly 3D Office Set [VNB] by VNBP- Leo https://vnbp.itch.io/low-poly-3d-office-set-vnb
